Use your browser developer tools to see the grid respond to different screen sizes.

row has margin:auto to left/right and has 80% width.

To create a non-fixed navigation use the code structure below.


  <!--not-fixed navigation-->
  <div class="nav">
  <div class="section" id="top">
      <div class="row">
          <a href="http://placehold.it">
              <div id="logo" class="logo"></div>
          </a>
          <nav id="nav">
              <ul>
                  <li><a href="#">Home</a></li>
                  <li><a href="#">About</a></li>
                  <li><a href="#">Contact</a></li>

              </ul>
              <ul class="ft-right">
                  <li><a href="#">Log In</a></li>
                  <li><a href="#">Log Out</a></li>
              </ul>
          </nav>
      </div>
      <!--end row-->
  </div>
  <!--end section-->
  </div>
  <!--end nav-->

Add/Remove the logo shrink withid='logo'to the following.


  <a href="http://placehold.it">
      <div id="logo" class="logo"></div>
  </a>
